synonyms.synonym: SMG P21 stimulatory GDP/GTP exchange protein

protein.specific_function: Stimulates GDP/GTP exchange reaction of a group of small GTP-binding proteins (G proteins) including Rap1a/Rap1b, RhoA, RhoB and KRas, by stimulating the dissociation of GDP from and the subsequent binding of GTP to each small G protein

reference.reference_text: Kikuchi A, Kaibuchi K, Hori Y, Nonaka H, Sakoda T, Kawamura M, Mizuno T, Takai Y: Molecular cloning of the human cDNA for a stimulatory GDP/GTP exchange protein for c-Ki-ras p21 and smg p21. Oncogene. 1992 Feb;7(2):289-93.
Vikis HG, Stewart S, Guan KL: SmgGDS displays differential binding and exchange activity towards different Ras isoforms. Oncogene. 2002 Apr 4;21(15):2425-32.
